markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs=""
>
[Transposition Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1286)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 31</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Transposition ammunition_ has a milky-white cast and will sometimes shift position subtly of its own accord. When you activate the ammunition, instead of making your Strike against a foe, you fire _transposition ammunition_ at any unoccupied square you can see within your weapon's first range increment and succeed without making an attack roll. You pull yourself through the [Astral Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=8), teleporting along with any items you are holding into the square where you shot the ammunition. If this would carry along any other creature (even one in an [extradimensional](/Traits.aspx?ID=67) space), the activation fails.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Transposition Ammunition
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 31</row>

**Price** 125 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Standard"
>
Transposition Ammunition (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 31</row>

**Price** 1,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

When you teleport, you can take along up to two willing adjacent creatures. These creatures must each arrive in unoccupied squares adjacent to the _transposition ammunition_; if there's not enough space for both of them, you choose which one is teleported.
name: Transposition Ammunition (Greater)
